parameters.name: MoveType
parameters.description: Type of move: 0 = Offset 1 = Translate 2 = Rotate

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: If MoveType is Rotate, then specify the angle at which to draft the faces

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to offset or translate the faces

title: IFeatureManager.InsertMoveFace
description: Obsolete. Superseded by IFeatureManager::InsertMoveFace2 and IFeatureManager::IInsertMoveFace2.
signature:
Feature InsertMoveFace( 
   System.Int32
MoveType
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseDir
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Double
Distance
)

parameters.name: MoveType
parameters.description: Type of move: 0 = Offset 1 = Translate 2 = Rotate

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: If MoveType is Rotate, then specify the angle at which to draft the faces

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to offset or translate the faces

remarks:
Use the following marks with
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
:
1 = face
2 = direction reference (plane, planar face, linear edge, or reference axis) for translate
4 = axis reference (linear edge or reference axis) for rotate
